typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	recordsBefore as string
}
source(output(
		id as integer,
		created_at as timestamp,
		updated_at as timestamp,
		transaction_id as string,
		provider_slug as string,
		identified as boolean,
		source as string,
		data as string,
		match_group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	batchSize: 10000,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_COMMITTED',
	query: (concat("SELECT * FROM import_transaction WHERE (created_at BETWEEN '", toString(subDays(currentDate(), 1)), "' AND '", toString(currentDate()), "') OR (updated_at IS NOT NULL AND updated_at BETWEEN '", toString(subDays(currentDate(), 1)), "' AND '", toString(currentDate()), "')")),
	format: 'query') ~> HarmoniaImportTransaction
HarmoniaImportTransaction sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HarmoniaImportTransactionExport
